## MapSources type


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type MapSources<T, Immediate> = {
    [K in keyof T]: T[K] extends WatchSource<infer V> ? Immediate extends true ? (V | undefined) : V : T[K] extends object ? Immediate extends true ? (T[K] | undefined) : T[K] : never;
};
```
